results.name: Inverse binomial transform of A169609, or of A144437 preceded by 1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3,-3).
program: (MAGMA) [ n le 2 select n else n eq 3 select -2 else -3*Self(n-1)-3*Self(n-2): n in [1..37] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Dec 03 2009
